description: Perfect Lemon Cupcakes: Soft, Sweet, and Super Easy
ingredients: [{"name": "large eggs", "units": "pieces", "amount": 2}, {"name": "cake flour", "units": "cups", "amount": 1.75}, {"name": "light brown sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "baking powder", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 1.5}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "baking soda", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "lemon zest", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "whole milk", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.67}, {"name": "vegetable oil", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "full-fat sour cream", "units": "cups", "amount": 0.33}, {"name": "salt", "units": "teaspoons", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "powdered sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": 3}]
instructions: 1. Set the oven to 350°F (175°C) and prep your cupcake pan with liners. 2. Combine cake flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, and lemon zest in a large bowl. 3. Add room temperature butter and beat on low, then increase to medium. 4. Whisk together eggs, sour cream, oil, and vanilla in a separate bowl. 5. Slowly pour the wet mixture into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. 6. Slowly stream in the milk until fully incorporated. 7. Scoop the batter into the cupcake liners, filling them just over halfway. 8. Bake for 13 to 15 minutes, checking for doneness. 9. Once baked, remove the cupcakes and let them cool completely. 10. For frosting, whip room-temp butter, gradually add powdered sugar, then add lemon zest and salt. 11. Frost the cooled cupcakes.
notes: Be gentle with the batter to avoid dense cupcakes. Measure flour correctly to prevent drying out.
